definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: growth from spilled kernels ((kernels) poured out, accidentally, in harvesting, acc. to most; Buhl:Lex 13 al. think of additional growth, √ I. [[ספח]]);—it is what springs up of itself in second year, and serves as food when no grain could be sown: abs. ´[[ס]] 2Ki 19:29 = Is 37:30; cstr. [[סְפִיחַ קְחִירְְ]] Le 25:5; sf. [[תִּקְחְרוּ אֶת־סְפִיחֶיהַ]] v:Le 25:11.
